upgradeSummary: This tool provides the mandatory sequential path to upgrade your instance safely.
Each version listed is a mandatory stop with specific instructions. Do not skip any steps.
Before you begin, please review the checklists and common warnings below.

preUpgrade: Backup your database and configuration files.
Review changelogs for all versions in your upgrade path.
Schedule the upgrade during a low-traffic period.
postUpgrade: Verify all services have restarted successfully.
Clear your browser cache to see the latest UI changes.
Monitor system performance and error logs.

commonWarnings.title: Potential Downtime
commonWarnings.details: The upgrade process requires restarting services, which will result in a brief period of downtime.
